meta.title: Setup Rust project foundation with Axum

task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 1 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Initialize the Rust project with Axum framework, PostgreSQL, Redis, and essential dependencies
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. cargo init --name teamsync-api 2. Add dependencies: axum = "0.7", tokio, sqlx with postgres feature, redis, serde, uuid 3. Setup Cargo.toml with workspace structure 4. Create src/main.rs with basic Axum server 5. Add .env.example and .gitignore 6. Configure tracing and structured logging

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-1): Setup Rust project foundation with Axum

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Verify project compiles and basic HTTP server starts on localhost:3000
